If p and q are integers and is represented in the form of p/q, then it is a:
The largest number that divides 70 and 125, which leaves the remainders 5 and 8, is:

The prime factorisation of 96 is
Which Rapid Spanning Tree Protocol port state is a combination of standard 802.1D STP's disabled, blocking and listening states?
Host A receives a frame and discards it after determining it is corrupt. Which OSI layer checks frames for errors?
No matter how it's configured, a single switch port is considered what?
Identify which of the services below uses both TCP and UDP ports.
A router with a BGP autonomous system number of 65001 is peered with another router with the same BGP AS. Which of the following is true?
questions.answer_a: The ebgp multihop command must be configured to reach an established state.
questions.answer_b: The routers are considered iBGP neighbors.
questions.answer_c: A BGP establishment error will occur because of the AS conflict.
questions.answer_d: The routers are considered eBGP neighbors.
questions.answer_right: The routers are considered iBGP neighbors.

questions.question: No matter how it's configured, a single switch port is considered what?
What is the default 802.1D short spanning tree port cost of a 10 Gbps Ethernet link?
Which of the following is the correct syntax to configure a switch port as a standard user port on VLAN 10 for data and VLAN 50 for VoIP?
questions.answer_a: TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport mode trunk TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport access vlan 10 TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport voice vlan 50
questions.answer_b: TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport mode access TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport access vlan 10 TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport voice vlan 50
questions.answer_c: TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport mode access TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport access vlan 10 TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport voip vlan 50
questions.answer_d: TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport mode access TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport access vlan 50 TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport voice vlan 10
questions.answer_right: TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport mode access TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport access vlan 10 TechTarget-SW1(config-if)#switchport voice vlan 50

questions.question: Your manager has requested you indicate which of the above ports will be Spanning Tree Protocol-designated ports.
questions.answer_a: Switch V1, Port Fa0/0; Switch V3, Port Fa0/0; Switch V3, Port Fa0/24
questions.answer_b: Switch V1, Port Fa0/24; Switch V0, Port Fa0/0; Switch V1, Port Fa0/24
questions.answer_c: Switch V1, Port Fa0/24; Switch V1, Port Fa0/0; Switch V2, Port Fa0/24
questions.answer_d: Switch V1, Port Fa0/24; Switch V2, Port Fa0/0; Switch V2, Port Fa0/24
questions.answer_right: Switch V1, Port Fa0/24; Switch V2, Port Fa0/0; Switch V2, Port Fa0/24
